title: Out Of The Park Baseball 17.X.X Patch - SoN
description:
Game: Out of the Park Baseball 17
Coded: March 19, 2016 by gone of SoN
Type: Patch

Description: Out of the Park Baseball ("OOTP") is the most sophisticated and best-selling baseball simulation game on the planet. Since its inception, OOTP has won numerous awards, including multiple "Sports Game of the Year" awards, en route to becoming the most immersive, realistic, and customizable baseball experience a fan can ask for!

Instructions: This is just a basic patch. Install OOTP 17 as normal. Open the patch as admin. Click the "Browse For Exe" button and select ootp17.exe from the installation folder. Tick the "Make Backup" box if you want to make a backup of the original exe. Click the "Crack Game" button. That is it. Enjoy!

Notes: Normally I like to put random stuff here but this time I have actual notes. This patch is a bit different from my other OOTP patches. You shouldn't have to enter a fake serial number at all. And instead of a new patch for every update, this one should just keep working (still have to patch after each update but you shouldn't have to download a new patch file). Now, I am making this claim after only testing it against the Gold Master Beta release but the game comes out in 2 days so we'll see. Now, because the game isn't out yet and only pre-order people have access to the beta, here is the download link: http://cdnfiles.ootpdevelopments.com/ootp/ootp17/versions/17.1.29.BETA_Hu7wt3fw87JDEf4egw/ootp17setup.exe
